website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, commercial-grade tent that gets rave reviews for cost effectiveness and durability in all types of weather.
pros: Thick material and double stitching make for a tough canopy that has potential to last
Easy to assemble with one or two people, and four included weight bags keep the tent in place
Four zippered sidewalls protect against the elements
cons: Can be heavy to transport, even with the included roller bag
Smaller size may not fit all guests underneath at once

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased , I go to a lot of events and have used the canopy's often, They are easy to set up and take down, This is a high quality item , Also love the roll around bag that comes with it !
customer_reviews.author: RichJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Sturdy. Well pleased with this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this canopy. It's easier to set up than the cheaper model I had before. It's taller and sturdier. I really like the strips of Velcro along the bottom edge of the cover. I put Velcro on my banner for the craft shows. And it's much neater than strings or zip ties. The 'feet' of the poles are more substantial and will stake into the ground very well. So far, I haven't needed additional weights for them. And the wheels on the carry case are handy too as this is a heavy canopy. I am well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy tents, easy to put up and down, and easy to put back into the bag. My favorite part of the tent is the mechanism used to lower and raise the tent. Most tents have those buttons you push and you run the risk of pinching your skin. This mechanism is on the outside and it seems highly unlikely you would ever have that problem. I wish they were cheaper so I could purchase more of them. But, that overall quality of this tent is better than what you paid. I would highly recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Black Hill Nature Programs

customer_reviews.title: Great tent but beware
customer_reviews.text: Great tent but beware, is very heavy. That being said, it's very durable, top-quality. You can tell it's well made. Even with the rollers, it's heavy but love the rolling case. Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2. 1 was new- 1 looked used
customer_reviews.text: One of the tents was perfect! The other looks as though it had been used before.. note the wheels in the pics and video. Also a tear in the bag. That same tent had a problem with one of the latches on one of the legs. It doesn’t want to click at all. I will be contacting the seller about this tent
customer_reviews.author: Andi Norwich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for parties, not as a long term installation. Found it easy to put up, easy to take down, and a breeze too get back in the roller bag. The velcro straps at the base of the bag help to get the legs just where you need them to get the bag zipped up quickly and easily. The blue color is good looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Puddy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had several canopies over the years and this is a solid design and very good value. Very easy to setup and take down by myself. I really like the additional side panels that can easily moved around to block the sun or rain. Just be sure to have significant weights when using the side panels, it's like a sail catching the wind. I mixed an 80 lb bag of concrete in each of four 5 gallon buckets and cured a horseshoe clamp in the mix for an attachment. The use four cam lock type motorcycle straps to secure the tent corners to the buckets. Seems to hold very well in small storms.
customer_reviews.author: LouKY6165

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. I would suggest this to anyone I know. Because of the pandemic I put my tables outside of the tent and use the small walls to keep customers away from my area worked out really well for my events that I went to. Setup says one person but definitely better if you have a couple different hands. The only thing I can't figure out is how to put all of the pieces in the carry-on case. I just bought a second little bag to carry all of the walls and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: mrwizard96

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The material is repelling the water really well
customer_reviews.text: The metal structure is impressive. Very sturdy. The material is repelling the water really well. The bottom of each panel flaps in the wind at-least 2 feet either way when it blows. That is really irritating and there is no way to stop it because you can't splay the legs out to make it tight. I sent them a message wanting a response to my dilemma and they never responded. So when the wind blows the sides dance around all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: There Are No Written Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This canopy tent comes without written instructions, which is why I knocked the rating down from 5 to 4 stars. I should also knock down another half a star because NO WAY is it as easy to put up as you see in the video. But I'm also willing to concede that if my wife and I put up as many tents as the folks at Eurmax do, we'd probably think it was easy. So, if the first time you are going to set this tent up is AWAY from wifi, FIRST download the video on how to do it from their website. Otherwise, a great tent, very strong construction, and we are glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Brodrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Four of us went to the beach and just wanted to hang out. I bought the tent on a lark and it turned out to be the BEST purchase. Four women (of an age) set it up in about 10 minutes the first day then in about five minutes each additional day. The sand bags kept the tent in place and there was no need for stakes. The only change I would recommend is to make the wheels bigger. We rolled it down the doc but ended up carrying it to the beach because the wheels were no match for the sand. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: the rail bars and half walls are not eurmax product. they are a cheap flimsy knock-off!!
customer_reviews.text: the canopy was fine. the rail bars and half walls were BAD! cheap knock-off! the half wall didn't even have a loop to hold the rail bar. you had to use velcro strap which worked but the you see the cheap railbar and the look is not good at all. I am getting a refund. Eurmax is a great product but when an "over seas" third party seller attempts to false advertise Eurmax products you need to make sure you are getting the true quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Canopy material is an upgrade from similar products
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade from typical economical canopies, but the cheap plastic levers for the height adjustment break easy. The frame is good, the material for the canopy is really good, just wish they had went a button depress type height adjustment mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Durable easy pop-up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and actually has held up in some pretty big winds. Sturdy little tent, ok color we got the tan but it’s really more of a light army beige. I would definitely recommend😀
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace one I bought a couple of years ago. Much better quality and sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to assemble and sturdy. The canopy fits tight enough that it sheds water instead of pooling. I had to go out with a broom handle and push the edges up to drain the canopy everything it rained on the old one. Not anymore. Thank you EurMax.
customer_reviews.author: Catsagt

customer_reviews.title: Huge bag
customer_reviews.text: We never set this canopy up because we realized with all our camping equipment there wouldn’t be room in the car for the GIANT bag. Seriously, ot was almost as tall as me, 5’2” No way we were lugging it around.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Nice canopy at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it set up to check it out. I did let it up through a good rain and no leaks noticeable. I did seal the seams before setting it up. Only thing I could see that I did not like is the pooling in one area of the roof. Not a big thing, just pushed it up and it drained easily. It is heavy but with the wheeled case it can be moved around reasonably easily. I'm happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: AOP Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: We used this tent for 2 weeks at the beach and it was awesome! My wife set up the tent each morning by herself, it's easy to do! It's sturdy and big. The sandbags are great for the beach and kept the tent in place through stiff winds.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: Love this pop up canopy
customer_reviews.text: I am doing the happy dance with this new pop up canopy. I do farmers markets and have been through other canopy's that did not set up as easy as this one. It is heavy, takes two old people to drag around and set up but once it's set up it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: TempestScout

customer_reviews.title: Not good in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Used it in the rain and noticed there are several leaks at the top. Very disappointed with the leaks, other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: SLATER

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good value, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought two tents that we use weekly at sporting events. They are very easy to set up/collapse and have been strong enough to deal with occasional windy days without worry. The color (orange) hasn't faded yet, they are easy to get back in the case -- it's been a huge improvement for us this summer. Some threads did start to come off the Velcro strips, but they don't affect the stitching. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tent
customer_reviews.text: We use this outside our RV to cover the picnic table. It was very easy to put up and take down. Sturdy, nice, quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: GRAB ALL THE ATTENTION!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for all of the festivals and craft fairs I do and it was PERFECT!!! The color drew attention to my booth just as I hoped. It was easy to put up, especially being tired. Blocked all the sun and never got hot. Super easy to take back down too and the bag is helpful being on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Lynn Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described. Definitely a 2-person operation. The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great Canopy!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t quite as easy to put up as the video showed. Course I was putting it up by myself with no help. Once it was up though, I could tell it was made much better than the previous canopy’s I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Barely- that’s the name Billy Gibbens gave me the first time I flew ZZ Top. That’s right , I was their pilot back in 1978-79, flew them on most of their concert excursions around the country. Always got a backstage pass to the concerts. What a great bunch of guys. Another pilot that flew them was Kie Nobra. The named him Kie Queen as in Sky King. The other pilot was Doug Giess. They named him Dog Lice Giess.

customer_reviews.title: Purple tent
customer_reviews.text: Tent is really nice the only thing I was missing was my ropes and spikes
customer_reviews.author: Latrice Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and not too terribly heavy. I'm 5'4" woman using for a craft fair and was able to carry it and put it up by myself. I store the top separate from the frame so it's easier to carry. Carrying bag is excellent..wheels work great.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great tent! ⛺️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I do craft shows on the weekends. Set up is easy and goes back in the bag well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. We fixed it because we had an event with no time to replace it. It works ok but we were disappointed it was broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: Nevermore

customer_reviews.title: Quality canopy that’s strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is awesome. It’s strong and sturdy but also easy to setup and take down by yourself. The construction is quality and I’ll definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Solid canopy
customer_reviews.text: Solid canopy tent. little tough to open solo but doable. Better than the cheap tents out there you pay for what you get, this one is built with a strong frame to hold up in bad weather and not collapse or fold over in wind
customer_reviews.author: greenpaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color !
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the frame I have - nice dark blue color .. little tight getting it on but well worth the time. Rain slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: perfect for pop up shops
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this canopy! It was the perfect choice for my pop up shops. My only issue is the opening at the bottom of the bag. The polls fall out when you wheel it but one you pack it differently it all work out
customer_reviews.author: Special

customer_reviews.title: Pop up
customer_reviews.text: The tent was easy to set up, the poles are stronger than other tents that our group purchased. A support brace broke and we did receive a replacement, which we were to only pay shipping but charged for the part and shipping.In the process of getting this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: bob maryas

customer_reviews.title: Great for tailgates and shows.
customer_reviews.text: I use for tailgates and craft shows. Easy for 2 people to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Peg

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easy to put up and take down. Surprisingly happy with the quality of the storage bag. I've purchased tents in the past and the bag is always junk. Not this one. It's built as well as the tent. Nice product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than the Caravan units I already have...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and as I expected for the price. Easy 5-minute one person setup and teardown. Nice surprise to find out it's also so easy to put unit in its roll away bag. Thick quality top cover but walls are not as good quality-wise.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick of Alamo, CA

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup/Tear Down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my first market season and it been the best for this solo traveler. Easy to set up and tear down alone, and the tear away side panels were a godsend when my booth was ever placed in direct line of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria I. Eber

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tent!
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy! But that is where hubby comes in! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Used this tent for a farmer's market - it was absolutely fabulous! Easy to set up, I did buy the velcro weights (added small landscape rocks for fill) which were super easy to keep the tent in place. Kept us dry on rainy days. I did purchase two sides for it after the first sunny day. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Milli

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, heavier than others but that makes it better. Tall, over 6 ft. On the first setting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great for art shows
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need two people to put this up and it's quite heavy - impossible to carry without a handtruck if there were no wheels on the case. Well put together and nice looking. Made out of quality material. Testing it out this weekend at my artist studio tour.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value- would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to set up, nice to have options for side panels, bring color that is a stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Just what I  needed
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought it would be and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very good Canopy - just longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the canopy, it is well made and functions well thus far. Only negatives are that the canopy when closed and bagged is still much longer than other canopies, I have to put my back seats flat for it to fit it my pathfinder which does not allow me to sit as many people. It is a terrific canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Christian W. Helmke

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid... Was at an event and all the other tenants were blowing away except this one really good price very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mike1467

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tent but heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this tent more than 3-4 times so far but it seems very sturdy. Heavier than expected for trying to travel with this tent but hope it continues to hold up better than cheaper tents that always seem to break.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had different canopies of this type before. We use it while surf fishing. The sides keep our 2 year old contained and much happier than a pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Definetly a big improvement in quality from our other canopy. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Big O

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean and take it down if the wind blow much
customer_reviews.text: Nice when new out of the box but not really sturdy in wind or rain but overall it does the job
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great tent.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pop up. Have bought lots of different ones through the years but so far this is the best quality. One of my favorite qualities is the bag. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: blair rego

customer_reviews.title: Tent is good but the sides are not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is good but to attach the sides, it was horrible. The clamps for the sides don't hold strong and they slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase it for farmer market shows and I really enjoy it. Easy to install and put away. Love that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: really durable., easy to assemble.,
customer_reviews.text: I had couple other similar products., but these brand i really recommend., really easy to place up., durable and strong., would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: ana presuel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our canopy.
customer_reviews.text: Love our canopy, easy set up 1 person can do as well as the take down. Fits in the bag easy and rolls like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: riki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy though!
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were higher levels. It is a little tougher to set up alone compared to other tents. Sturdy though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessieshopstoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the money. Relatively easy to set up and break down. Rolling case makes getting it from truck to site easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kary Greif

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my canopy, had a small issue with the cover and the issue was taken care of quickly. When I need another canopy I will order from you again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Evalette Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this cover far exceeded my expectations. Extremely well built. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Segrin

customer_reviews.title: Great for team sports!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent . Highly recommend for team sports who travel! This company has great customer service as well. They also sell parts, so if you need a certain piece you are able to get it thru them! Our team is very happy with this tent! We were so delighted that we bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: liked it worked well, easy take down and storage bag
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: We love the easy release on the adjustments
customer_reviews.text: We love the easy release on the adjustments. Also love the fact that you don't have to lash down the cover! We use it every time we go to Mexico for the weekend and sit on the beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Huey

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: We use these tents almost every weekend and they are well made and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: BigJay

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great tent.Up in a minute
customer_reviews.text: It makes a great tent. Sides are well made with velcro attachments to the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Roe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was a gift for my son in-law, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys S Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the tent. It is easy to assemble. We use it twice a week for pop ups and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much stronger than you expect/easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This bugger has been out during several wind storms. It held together perfectly. The velcro closures are very strong. Plus the walls zip together. It went up fast. I use it in my backyard as a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Right color goes great with our company logo and large enough for our community events.
customer_reviews.author: CORE Church

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right Bob!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the Cross Country team. They LOVE it! It is lighter than an EZ UP and just as big. I highly recommend of the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Principal Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Eurmax was very easy to work with .From design to delivery everything was smooth as could be
customer_reviews.author: James dykeman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts break easy. The wheels do not stay under tent when carting around.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Little confusing to setup but once it's up it's a great canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful addition to add for family adventures!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to set it up alone very easy to assemble no hassle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass pop up
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I bought the pop up for my youngest daughters club soccer team. It has made through numerous road trips and league play. Very easy to set up. Most of all is the way it goes down and packs up in the bag. Thanks a lot great product. Jim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used product for new price wow
customer_reviews.text: Poles were rusted when I opened the box used 🙄
customer_reviews.author: lulu main

customer_reviews.title: Enure you know what panel goes where when fully unzipped.
customer_reviews.text: Good but could be a heavier quality. You need to ensure all legs are even and then you can zip it. Nice to see panels numbered but would help if you knew what sides go where in the event you unzip all sides for storage.
customer_reviews.author: vivienne a grouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great portability, wheels make it easy to transport. The well made canopy and structure frame will yield many years of use. Thank you Eurmax.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Strong support system, tight canopy, the best is the little buttons to extend the legs = no pinched fingers!! LOVE the bag with wheels, great quality on all areas of this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The canopy is very nice. It's made very well and of high quality materials. Their customer service is top notch and quick.
customer_reviews.author: John Calvanico

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Far our preforms any other pop up. Looks professional with a y’all peak
customer_reviews.author: Preston Fittro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good construction and quality. The best pop-up tent I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to erect
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up! Easy to put up. Would like to have a vented top.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lochridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy, just a little heavier than I'm use to.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality tent, same quality as the last ones I had from them that lasted 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pandeloglou

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to put up shelter used for work. A little on th light side for the feet but otherwise worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg n.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just a little heavier than I thought. Made of sturdy material, the case is easy to handle....
customer_reviews.author: Chester Cochee

customer_reviews.title: I like this canopy but it isn't as easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this canopy but it isn't as easy to put up as stated. It definitely takes 2 people, especially if you are short.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Bolton

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Professional Grade, very easy to put up and take down... Extremely Pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reed

customer_reviews.title: STRONG and STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy, which is a good thing. Easy to use, portable, and STRONG and STURDY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it. Only thing is it's a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Only thing is it's a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: william t colvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was a breeze to set up. Well worth the price! Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, helpful sellers.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with the tent, but then noticed a defect in the manufacture of it upon setting it up. Fortunately the staff of the company have been working hard to get the issue fixed. But enough about what went wrong. One thing I love about the tent, the carry case it comes in is very well designed and thought out. Makes it easy to transport a fairly heavy tent around, with nice big wheels that let you roll easily over grass. The tent itself is sturdy, and I was impressed with how it held up to heavy winds while setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tent envied amongst vendors, needs stronger stitches but pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kunta 4 life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very durable and works great. Finally no fear of pinching the fingers when taking down. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Fletcher Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. A little on the heavy side, but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: ... cook tent when I am camping and it is great for that
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a cook tent when I am camping and it is great for that .
customer_reviews.author: Bob Belcher

product_meta.title: Eurmax 10'x10' Ez Pop-up Booth Canopy Tent Commercial Instant Canopies with 1 Full Sidewall & 3 Half Walls and Roller Bag, Bonus 4 SandBags + 3 Cross-Bar
feature_bullets: ◆ Eurmax Canopy is most trusted & best selling pop up canopy brand based in the USA. We stock all kinds of accessories and parts for the products we are selling and if you have anything about our products, we are ready to help you.

◆ 10x10 ez pop up frame:(1)Strong full truss structure design(2)Hammertone powder coated finishing,Good looking and rust resistance.(3)The latest thumb lock system,easy to lock and release(4)Three height positions,clearance height from-peak height from 10.5ft,10ft to 11.1ft.Set up and take down easily by 1 or 2 person in minutes without any tools.

◆ 10x10 heavy duty canopy tent fabric:CPAI-84 fire retardant certificated 500D polyester PU coated to block about 99% UV rays,Sidewall is 210D.Stitching lines are all seam sealed to prevent water penetrate from seames to make our canopy tent waterproof.◆The roller bag:Eurmax unique L shaped roller bag is oversize designed,it is easy to put frame and top in th bag.Big 2.7"diameter wheels,1680D strong polyester,2 layers fabric sewed,reinforced handles,all these makes the bag long lasting.
